page.text: Report reference: , Reference OIE : 29084, Report Date : 08/01/2019, Country : China (People's Rep. of)

text.b: Name of sender of the report
Date of start of the event
Date of confirmation of the event

page.text: First occurrence of a listed disease in the country

After ASF occurred in Shenbei New District of Shenyang City in Liaoning Province, control measures such as blockade, killing and disposal and disinfection were applied, in accordance with the requirements of “the Contingency Plan for ASF” and

“Technical Regulation on ASF Control (Trial)”. After affected pigs were killed in the affected areas, no new outbreaks and positive samples have been found for the 6 consecutive weeks in surveillance and monitoring. Local animal husbandry and

veterinary authorities organized the acceptance for laboratory tests and on-site assessments in the affected areas. The results of the acceptance were in compliance with the regulations on the blockade lift in the affected areas, and the ASF outbreak was

solved. The local government decided to lift the blockade at 00:00 o’clock of the 29th of September 2018. The Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs requires the local animal husbandry and veterinary sectors to continue to strengthen the surveillance
and monitoring and take active prevention and control measures, as to prevent the recurrence of ASF.

After ASF occurred in Dagaokan village, Gaokan township, Dashiqiao City, Yinkou City, in Liaoning Province, control measures such as blockade, killing and disposal and disinfection were applied, in accordance with the requirements of “the

Contingency Plan for ASF” and “Technical Regulation on ASF Control (Trial)”, the total of 710 pigs in coherent herd were killed in the affected areas, and disposed the culled pigs in biosafety method. No new outbreaks and positive samples have been

found for the 6 consecutive weeks in surveillance and monitoring. Local animal husbandry and veterinary authorities organized the acceptance for laboratory tests and on-site assessments in the affected areas. The results of the acceptance were in

compliance with the regulations on the blockade lift in the affected areas, and the ASF outbreak was solved. The local government decided to lift the blockade at 00:00 o’clock of the 22nd of November 2018. The Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs

requires the local animal husbandry and veterinary sectors to continue to strengthen the surveillance and monitoring and take active prevention and control measures, as to prevent the recurrence of ASF.

text.b: Source of the outbreak(s) or origin of infection

page.text: • surveillance outside containment and/or protection zone
• official disposal of carcasses, by-products and waste

text.b: The report and all its outbreaks have been resolved.
